name: Fees and costs of litigation Note Exception to liability for county lifeguard services (repealed June 30, 2007).  L 2002, c 170. Hydrogen fuel research public and private partnership (repealed July 1, 2006).  L 2001, c 283. Cross References
text: Fees and costs of litigation.  A county shall not be liable for expenses or fees, including attorney fees, that a person incurs in bringing an action under this part and shall not elect to pay those expenses or fees. [L 2001, c 227, pt of §1]
